content: this pdf crochet pattern is for a crocheted shawl in a lovely broad rectangular shape i was again inspired by peacock feathers and the peacock colour palette when designing it the stitch pattern is in the shape of a plume and also a peacock feather so that s why the shawl is called the peacock plume feather shawl enjoy pattern includes 1 clear written instructions in bullet point format 2 some close-up photos of the stitch pattern 3 chart 4 us and uk crochet terms dutch version also available 5 details on the yarn and colours i used general info ~yarn scheepjes whirl details in pattern ~crochet hook 3 5mm and 4mm ~size after blocking 49 x 137cm / 19 5 x 54in ~level advanced beginners see my shop for more pdf crochet pattern tutorials i am working on more shawl designs and i have made quite a few peacock design patterns and more are on the way copyright information © christa veenstra 2023 when you buy my original design patterns feel free to sell the items that you make from them you bought them so do with the finished items what you want i do want to ask you though that you credit me for the design with a link to my shop especially when selling the items online please note that it is not allowed to sell or distribute my patterns to others they are for personal use only for that would be an infringement of copyright thank you christa
